text:
For the development branch, it appears fop.bat is missing a library link to the 
Jakarta Commons' sandbox IO component.  Its absence was causing class not found 
errors that disappeared when I included the .jar file.
creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
glenmazza@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 5847
DIFF file for fop.bat

That was my bad.

Applied. Thanks! I hope this is the beginning of a series of patches. :-)
